meanings.definition: A measuring tool used to measure length in meters.
meanings.sent1: I used the metersticks to measure the length of the table.
meanings.sent2: The carpenter always carries his metersticks to measure accurately.
meanings.sent3: The metersticks decided to have a race to see who could measure the fastest.
meanings.sent4: Her precision was like that of a skilled archer, hitting the target with the accuracy of metersticks.
meanings.sent5: The metersticks stood tall and proud, ready to measure anything in their path.

meanings.definition: A long, thin stick marked with measurements in meters.
meanings.sent1: She grabbed one of the metersticks to check the length of the fabric.
meanings.sent2: The classroom had colorful metersticks hanging on the wall for the students to use.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel used the metersticks as balance beams in the forest.
meanings.sent4: The metersticks in the art studio were like artists, creating precise measurements with each stroke.
meanings.sent5: The metersticks lined up perfectly, like soldiers ready for duty.
